NERD

[nurd]

Our business is built on relationships – it sounds cliche, but it’s true. We believe that repeat business and growth stem from great work that keeps our clients coming back – NOT on sales and spin, but a true partnership with measurable results. This is why many of our clients have been with us for over 10 years.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1594221604585{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1594222718449{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1594222771581{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”10/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1594222637241{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594221971439{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”links-show”]

We are a fearless group of nerds that love taking on challenges! With collaboration at our core, we are ready to work with you to handcraft winning web solutions. We excel at listening and then acting on your needs, to deliver a successful logo design, web design & development, and SEO. Our team of Toronto experts is equipped with the knowledge, experience, and passion needed to get the job done and are poised to deliver a wide range of website design and development services.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1593462469945{padding-top: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column parallax=”content-moving” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1591893422154{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”letter-post”]

FAMILY OWNED AND OPERATED

Our business is built on relationships – it sounds cliche, but it’s true. We believe that repeat business and growth stems from great work that keeps our clients coming back and NOT on sales pitches, but a true partnership with measurable results. This is why many of our clients have been with us for over 14+ years.

We take your investment in your business’ website and online marketing very seriously. With a critical focus on providing our clients with the best web design, logo design, graphic design, and SEO solutions in Toronto. Hand-crafted and user friendly while providing innovative website development and digital marketing that delivers actual results. We are a family-owned and operated business established in 2006.

Our professional in-house designers and developers have been sharpening their skills and utilizing the latest and greatest technologies to help our clients achieve their online sales goals year in and year out. At A Nerd’s World, we stay true to our philosophy that effective website and eCommerce solutions combine great web design, user experience, rock-solid technology, and integrated web marketing.

We have worked with startups, small businesses, and large corporations to provide professional and reliable website design and SEO with measurable results. We’ve helped thousands of companies in Toronto and around the globe gain a competitive edge in their industry while providing an unmatched level of personal attention and customer support.

If you require any further information, or would like to work with us, feel free to contact our founders Chris and Grace directly at nerd@anerdsworld.com.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1591981289305{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

Flagship store opening day, 2012

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594640283176{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

The Hughes Family in Paris, 2018

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”home-services vc-no-bottom-margin” css=”.vc_custom_1594222179376{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1593189637253{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

WHY A NERD’S WORLD?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

We are an experienced and passionate team of professionals that live and breathe web design and development, logo design and SEO. All our services are offered in-house and are integrated to exceed your business requirements.  We are pioneer in presenting genuine & inventive web design, web development and search engine optimization solutions in slicing, adaptation, assimilation and customization services.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1594219156979{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594219148633{margin-top: -50px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”fix-mobile-neg-box”]

1

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

AUTHENTIC

We didn’t reinvent the wheel. We simply focus on winning one customer at a time. Creating a culture of integrity and accountability not only improves our effectiveness, it also generates a respectful and enjoyable setting in which to work.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1594219162735{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594218779817{margin-top: -50px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”fix-mobile-neg-box”]

2

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

100% IN HOUSE

Our goal when we created A Nerd’s World over a decade ago was the same as it is today:  We are a honest results-driven company based in Toronto proudly offering in-house website design, logo design and SEO services since day one. That’s right zero outsourcing!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1594219168703{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594218787585{margin-top: -50px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”fix-mobile-neg-box”]

3

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

REPUTATION

Our reputation and integrity is everything. We follow through on what we say we’re going to do. Credibility can only be built over time, and it is built from the history of our words and actions.  After thousands of projects, we are proud of our reputation for success. 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_btn title=”CONTACT US” style=”flat” shape=”square” color=”warning” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Fbest-toronto-web-design%2F|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”45px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1594222478198{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594219717238{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

!important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581368941676{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”15″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

Here are some of our most frequently asked questions and answers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_toggle title=”What does the word nerd represent?”]We are a hardworking team who are passionate about what we do. As nerds, we immerse ourselves in our love for design an development, making sure that much attention to detail is considered and we are constantly evolving in being the best![/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How long have you been in business?”]We started A Nerd’s World in our home office in early 2006 to the present day. We continue to grow our clientele all over the world for the last 15+ years and have no plans on stopping any time soon![/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Who do you work with?”]Everyone! We have worked with local mom and pop shops to big corporations and Fortune 500 businesses.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Do you work with local business only?”]We work with all; from local to international clients for informational websites, portfolios, and e-commerce.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What has led you to work in this industry?”]We started our own successful online businesses which we did our own branding, marketing, sales, customer service, and websites. This led us to offer website builds and direct guidance from our experience.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What makes you different?”]From the very beginning, we have connected with each and every client – providing individual care to the needs of each project. We’re not cookie cutter and we’re proud of it![/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Check us out on YouTube!”]If you would like to find out more about us, I welcome you to visit our YouTube.com/anerdsworld page today![/vc_toggle][vc_empty_space height=”45px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
